about_the_game:
Grim news in the Eborean Empire - nobles, or people who can use Magia in other words, are vanishing without a trace! There are reports from neighboring kingdoms and republics that similar incidents are occurring in those regions as well. And all of this comes just after the widespread adoption of gunpowder weapons and steam engines. That could only mean one thing - Uprising.

After being directly threatened by the Uprising, your task is to assemble a group of skilled companions to unravel this mystery and stop your hunters from capturing you. Who knows what would they do, but most likely, something sinister.





Fight the enemies in a grid based strategy turn based battles in a way you want:
  • Create your own character from different fantasy races and backgrounds, be it Noble or Commoner.
  • Use different weapons for different needs - from two-handed mauls to throwable poison bottles.
  • If weapons are not enough, various class skills will help you get an edge.
  • Gather experience and level up you and your companions to make them stronger and to unlock new classes to upgrade to.





Plan your next moves and prepare for upcoming battles in your own airship:
  • Upgrade airship for various boons in battle
  • Equip and purchase new weapons and upgrade your party members classes
  • Upgrade weapons that you currently have in exchange for some scrap found in battles
  • Run around in circles if you want, airship acts as a hub so your character can move freely





it's dangerous to go alone, so there will be companions to help you:
  • Equip and upgrade each one as needed
  • Fighting near them will increase their devotion towards you
  • High devotion will give small buffs for you and companion
  • Special optional mission for each companion with unique reward
  • And tea drinking of course

name: Spellpowder: Uprising
short_description: Spellpowder: Uprising is an upcoming strategy RPG set in fantasy steampunk setting. Lead your squad to victory through wide streets, dark forests and cold snow lands. Level up, equip, promote your troops and lead them carefully (or not) in upcoming battles.
